hey all, i'm currently working on an integration for email subscriptions using the `communication-preferences` API. we needed to allow users to resubscribe after they've unsubscribed, so we used the new V4 endpoint `<https://api.hubapi.com/communication-preferences/v4/statuses/batch/write>`

from what i understand, this should allow us to do what we need to do. issue is our connected app doesn't have access to the scopes for this endpoint, and we can't enable it in the scopes either.

any ideas why? i've contacted tech support already and they've sent me here... so any help appreciated!

Hi, I have a question:
I am creating an email template via the API endpoint.
I am pushing also variables such as unsubscribe link and other HS defualt properites.
For some reason, those variables are disappearing when the template is created in HS.
Anyone know why?
